name: Fight Angel
description:
An all-female character fighting game that fully customizes the character.
Several major features:
Classic fighting system, 3D beautiful picture, super strong sense of hit and operation.
The easy-to-use continuous skill system makes it easy for novices to make combos.
All customizable character creation systems, from face to body, from hair style to clothing, from bust to hip, all can be customized with free size, you know it.
The new dynamics of the realistic chest swaying physical effect system, wearing clothing will affect the shape of the swaying, more authentic.
The perfect clothes breaking system may be the most perfect breaking system in the fighting game, and all the clothes can be broken! (Of course, if you don't like it, you can turn off the effect in the system option)
Complete story mode and arcade mode, local battle mode, the full version will also join the network battle function.
More clothing and new characters are still in production! You can purchase the early access version to support us!
